I had been work to make the World Wide Web more than Search, Facebook and Porn, helping to make internet connection and artificial intelligence the main providers of improvements to the society connecting people, business and governments.

Sophia's dad, Aline's husband and mama's beloved one.

Sometimes developing front-end, sometimes back-end, other times creating layouts or taking care of user experience experiments.

Doesn't matter what, always trying to keep myself more fool than full.

Discover more about me using these tabs above.

Discover more about me swipping over this content.

Coding since 2001 using different languages and frameworks, I'm still in love with web development, dazzled with the continuous learning and infinite challenge source.

I'm experienced with server and frontend development stuffs, focused in ubiquitousness and responsivess for high audience.

Most relevant jobs:

· Lofty's senior full stack developer, I have being work at Cabarete beach since 2015.

· UOL employee for 4 years, I worked with the back office development team building and maintaining REST full applications.

· Former Itaú Bank / Orbitall intranet developer and Digital Communications Analyst.

· I built some games and interactive contents to Humor Tadela, a pioneer humor site in Brazil.

Please, follow me at github

I use to draw a lot in my childhood, so I became a professional illustrator when I was 20 years old, working with Flash games and animations at Humor Tadela, a pioneer brazilian humor site.

After all, I worked as a freelancer at some advertising agencies, being coachee for Art Directors as Reynaldo Andreatta, Gidelson Trigueiro and others, blending codes and art.

A few years latter, I had to learn more about beauty and meaning ( semiotics ) when I were promoted in a job at a brazilian bank called Itaú, with the role of "Digital Communications Analyst" and responsible for approving jobs proposals from advertisement agencies and keeping them compliant to business requirements.

At last, I started to share ( getting more than giving ) visual skills at UNIP university as a teacher.

You can see some illustrations samples at: Deviant Art and at Pinterest

Listen to my music on Sound Cloud using the built in radio on this site.

I was raised in a poor family and we didn't have money enough to afford a college to me, but my mother and my aunt worked at a college, called Faculdade das Américas ( Nowadays called Faculdade Flamingo ).

I convinced the rector to gave me a scholarship in exchange of work, so I developed sites, PHP and MySQL systems to publish the students grades, the library books and a CRUD to manage internship offers.

At Itaú bank, I got another free scholarship at FIA(USP) to do a Master Business Administration degree about Human Resources Management.

After this, I came back to education environment in another college/university as a teacher, taught for five years at the Universidade Paulista's Digital Communication course, and leave the job because I needed the money of the employee founds (FGTS) to get married.

Now, I'm looking for another opportunity to teach again. Please let me know if you think that I could be useful in any kind of classes. I will enjoy it.
